price: 4. Sinaamey rabteeniik lakal gacim siinik inkih Yallâ fanah yakkek Kay digaalák cibbarsima, Yalli ummaan iimih dudda li kinni rabteeniik lakal sin ugsaah sin kobxisaah sin galtaamah.
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
